pullRequest.title: Added an effect to stop the server
pullRequest.bodyText:
Target Minecraft Versions: any 
Requirements: none 
Related Issues: none

commit.message: Switched to an enum and added skript doc annotations

nodes.bodyText: Theres no pattern for reload. As discussed earlier I dont think it should be added, but regardless either add a pattern or remove the method in the execute.
this should have variations for stop/restart
What do you mean by "If restarting isn't configured, the server will stop."?

commit.message: switched from an int to the boolean

nodes.bodyText: Uh... isn't it just (restart ? "restart" : "stop") + " the server";
IMO you should put each pattern on it's own line 🙂
Maybe put restart server on it's own line? They are pretty short though.

commit.message: Merge branch 'EffStopServer' of https://github.com/DeltaRays/Skript into EffStopServer
